article_title: Oakland Zoo proposes elephant preserve in Tehama County
article_text:

og.description: Against a backdrop of the setting sun, the silhouette of African elephants is seen as they graze on the flora of the grass-covered foothills. A common sight in Africa — but in Tehama County?
